title: Community Build Projects in Timor-Leste Quiz

questions.question: What is a community build project?
choices: A construction project that involves the active participation of community members
A project funded entirely by external donors
A project designed and executed by a professional construction company
A project that excludes community involvement
questions.answer: A construction project that involves the active participation of community members

questions.question: Community build projects have a history in Timorese culture.
Community builds can contribute to rural development and nation-building in Timor-Leste.
What is the Tetum term for sacred houses in Timor-Leste?
Gotong royong is a concept that refers to:
Traditional Timorese communal building practices often involve rituals and ceremonies.
What is the first stage of a community build project?
Project planning and design involve:
Mobilizing the community is an essential step in a community build project.
Project handover and maintenance are not important stages in a community build project.
Community build projects can help strengthen community bonds.
Which of the following is a benefit of community build projects?
Community builds are often more cost-effective than projects entirely reliant on external resources.
Community participation in building projects can lead to an increased sense of ownership and pride.
Community build projects can help preserve traditional building techniques.
Which of the following is NOT a common challenge for community build projects in Timor-Leste?
choices: Diverse skill levels within the community
Balancing traditional practices with modern requirements

questions.question: Ensuring long-term maintenance is a challenge for community build projects.
The case study analysis in this lesson focuses on:
choices: A successful community build project in Timor-Leste
A failed community build project in Indonesia
A project entirely funded by external donors
questions.answer: A successful community build project in Timor-Leste

questions.question: Analyzing a case study can provide lessons learned and best practices for future community build projects.
In the hands-on activity, students design a proposal for a small community build project.
The project proposal should include:
The student assignment involves researching and documenting a recent or ongoing community build project in their area.
The assignment report should include a description of the project and its goals.
Students should document the community involvement process in their assignment report.
The assignment report should discuss the challenges faced during the project and how they were overcome.
Outcomes and community impact are important aspects to include in the assignment report.
Students should provide suggestions for future improvements in their assignment report.
Including photos or sketches of the project is recommended for the assignment report.
The main goal of this lesson is to:
choices: Promote understanding and appreciation of community build projects in Timor-Leste
Discourage community involvement in construction projects
Advocate for the exclusive use of professional construction companies
Emphasize the importance of external funding for all projects
questions.answer: Promote understanding and appreciation of community build projects in Timor-Leste

questions.question: Community build projects have the potential to contribute to sustainable development in Timor-Leste.
